param_input_item.param_description: 1-by-3 vector, m-by-3 matrix, character vector, cell array of character vectors or string array.

param_output_item.param_description: RGB values: RGB triplet or matrix of RGB triplets.

description.p: The validatecolor function is a color validation function that checks whether a given color is valid according to Nelson standards.
It takes a color argument as input and returns an error if the color is not valid.

example_item.example_item_data: RGB = validatecolor('red') RGB = validatecolor('purple') RGB = validatecolor({'#8000FF','#00FF00','#FF9900'}, 'multiple') RGB = validatecolor({'red','green','blue'},'multiple')
